wikipedia_page.main: Sabrina Ghayour (born 5 January 1976 in Tehran, Iran) is a British-Iranian Chef, food writer and author. She is the host of the supper club ‘Sabrina's Kitchen’ and released her first cookbook, Persiana, in May 2014.

response: | North West || Matt Worswick || Eve Townson || Mark Ellis || Sat Bains || Sabrina Ghayour

As well as appearances from Sabrina Ghayour, Theo Randall, and Vivek Singh, Tebbutt and Oliver were also joined by previous Great British Bake Off contestants, including former winners Candice Brown, Edd Kimber, Frances Quinn, and Jo Wheatley.
*Sabrina Ghayour (born 1976), Iranian-born chef and cookbook writer
